Class StudentBoundary

java.lang.Object
boundary.BaseBoundary
boundary.StudentBoundary
public class StudentBoundary extends BaseBoundary
Console boundary class for student-facing interactions in the internship management system. This class provides the student dashboard interface and delegates business operations to the StudentController. It handles all student-related menu navigation, application management, and withdrawal request processing through a console-based UI.

Key responsibilities include:

  • Displaying eligible internships for application
  • Managing student internship applications (view, accept offers, withdraw)
  • Handling withdrawal request creation and tracking
  • Providing password change functionality

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentBoundary

      public StudentBoundary(StudentController ctl, AuthController auth)
      Creates a new StudentBoundary instance bound to the specified controllers.
      Parameters:
      ctl - the student controller that implements core student operations
      auth - the authentication controller used for password management
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either controller is null

  • Method Details

    • menu

      public void menu(String studentId)
      Main student menu loop that presents the student dashboard and handles user interaction. This method displays the primary navigation menu and processes user selections for various student operations. The loop continues until the user chooses to logout.

      Menu options include:

      • View Available Internships
      • View My Applications
      • View My Withdrawal Requests
      • Change Password
      • Logout
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier (login key) of the currently authenticated student
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if the studentId is invalid or access is denied
